content: These include continuing to cut excess costs, including in Europe, where we have already initiated exits and partial wind downs in certain countries; leveraging our strengthened financial position to continue obtaining improved terms from suppliers and vendors; getting full console allocations to help us meet customer demand during this extended cycle; assessing partnerships with gaming and retail companies that can enable us to capture cost-effective top line growth; leveraging our unique refurbishment capabilities to drive growth in pre-owned; and building a stronger presence in higher-margin categories like collectibles and toys where we have already seen pockets of growth.
